text: Jim Émilien Ngowet Allevinah (born 27 February 1995) is a French-born Gabonese footballer who plays as a forward for Clermont Foot. ==International career== He made his debut for Gabon national football team on 23 March 2019 in an Africa Cup of Nations qualifier against Burundi, as a starter. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:French people of Gabonese descent Category:Living people Category:Gabonese footballers Category:French footballers Category:Gabon international footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Aviron Bayonnais FC players Category:Le Puy Foot 43 Auvergne players Category:Clermont Foot players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:Championnat National 2 players Category:Championnat National 3 players
title: Jim Allevinah
